reviewText: Good, the story was good but no ending. How ever the seens were great and the animation was good. All in all worth the money, but not well worth:)
Angel blade is the best anime porn I have seen. I have and will continue to enjoy the angel blade series.
I love old school anime. If you do than you will like this too. The first episode is not avalible on dvd.

Okay, here's what you get:

Two Disc:

1st disc -Angel Blade, that was released as a stand alone disc 6 Chapters

2nd disc, contains "Angel Blade Returns" 6 Chapters and you get recap chatper's of Angel blade, which make's no sense, since you get Angel Blade. Its a waste of digital space.

And that's it.. I was hoping for a "Complete Collection" of the series.. not just half baked version like this.

But for the price.. if you missed out on the original angel blade, this is a good deal.

Animation Quality is okay, its better than A LOT of hentai I've seen, mainly because of the great illustration that obviously went into the character designs. (watching this on an hd tv) Display format is not set up for this, its a standard display ratio. Which in this day and age is like a slap to the face.

Audio Quality Is alright. Both the English Dubs and Japanese Language with Subs.

It would be nice to see them do a real re-release of this series, completely redone on bluray, to bible black animation quality. It seems like it would be easy to do, just require the funding. I mean if you already have the concept clearly done, it shouldn't be a big deal to hire the people to make a higher quality version. Maybe expand on some of the scenes, because some are a little thrown together, which you can tell.

Story, obviously if you've seen Angel blade, Angel Blade Returns is just more of the same, although not as good, its like a bridge in the middle of a story, it just serves to get you across a gap. The title makes it sound like its a movie.. but its just continuing story wise where the first Angel Blade left off. And Angel Blade Returns, doesn't complete the story.... So you get stuck with another cliff hanger. I'm guessing, but not 100% sure That Angel Blade punish is the final to this series. So if your wanting a complete story, you might want to buy this and Angel Blade Punish?
a young girl is transforms in to a super hero to save post apocalyptic world. she does get to get the girl though.

I feel weird giving this five stars... I assure you it's based on the product. The discs worked perfectly and there was no damage to the cover, so no reason to knock off any points there. As for the story...

Well, I've made it a goal to have as many experiences as possible in my life, and 'real' hentai was one of them. It's certainly all it's cracked up to be! Angel Blade is strange in so many ways, and all the more 'enjoyable' for it. I can't rate this based on acting or animation or anything like that -it's not appropriate, I feel- but I got my experience and that's what I was looking for.

As far as I can tell, the story is about a shy girl who has a second personality known as Angel Blade, a scantily (at MOST) clad heroine that battles and evil character that is trying to, honestly I'm not sure. Other reviews say that this isn't the full series, that one part is missing, and from my research I think that's correct, but if you're just looking to pop something mindless in and let it run, this is good.

Product title boasts itself as a complete collection, but is not so.

It contains Angel Blade, and its sequel, Angel Blade Returns. But the third installment, Angel Blade Punish is not included.

This isn't rocket science. Don't call it complete if it's only 2/3 of the series because it's just not true.

I bought this for my husband, and while I can't say I enjoyed it, he did. I had no clue what I was getting into, I thought it was going to be some cheesy magical girl hentai... It's a bit kinkier than I expected. Shemale, torture, humiliation, and demons were common in this set. I do have to say that the art in this set is pretty decent though.

This appears to have the collection, just differently: I had gotten Angel Blade from another source (I forgot where/how) in 3 .AVIs as Episodes 1,2,3 all about 600kb each.  This Disk 1 main title is Eps 1+2 where Disk 2 (AB Returns) has Ep 3.  The action and screenplays are identical; this set has 2 extra comments; 2 preview sets of erotic Anime and 2 remix/music-videos.  The resolution, audio quality appear the same as my old ones BUT if you don't have those this would be a way of getting them.  The cost was reasonable.  Wish I knew that before buying, WHAT I hoped for was inclusion of any deleted scenes (unlikely in a XXX show), upgraded resolution (unlike real photography with actors artwork simply does not have extra details to show)  and audio...no such luck!  I remember seeing another AB series besides the original or "Punish" and had hoped that might be within this "complete" collection, no luck there either.

  This pilot show displays Angle Blade XXX nude, unlike the sequel, with some sexier stop-action views.

Another issue, never discussed but seen clearly here is the committee decided single teat size and shape: all the women have a wide genetic variations: blonds with blue eyes, red heads, brunet and black haired girls of various heights and builds; even some dark and tan skinned ones in the mix.  One scene shows all girls nude WHILE their breasts are very slightly different sizes their teats all appear identical: same size, shape and mostly same color; as if some committee decided that one teat shape was all their animators should use; too hard to draw special ones for each girl (not likely - they all have individual costumes, faces, hair and height)??  This issue is present in many R/X-rated anime where many girls are topless.  Just my own idiosyncrasy and want for realism.

Series is incomplete, even with second OVA (Punish).  Angel Blade is another incomplete series dumped into the North American market that will never see completion from the original Japanese animators.  In terms of plot:  It is your standard hentai fare; so don't expect much character development.  The animation is decent.

A very deserved hentai. Animation is spot on throughout the series. I purchased this and the angel blade ova angel blade punish to make a true complete collection of my own design. The disc for punish is the same as the cover just showing a bit of something..... Plot...

In the near future, the earth is covered in a chemical smog and Dark Mother, evil villainess, leads a secret organization devoted to world domination. But there is a masked heroine named Angel Blade, a beautiful woman who fights the evil of Dark Mother.

Angel blade punish plot...
 Moena was a normal college girl until she discovered that she had special powers hidden by her father within her body. When Dark Mother and her army of sexy demon women threaten the virgins of the world, Moena transforms into the naked masked heroine Angel Blade. Moena's stepmother, the well endowed Kyka, is kidnapped by Dark Mother. With the help of a team of barely dressed heroines and the dark-skinned succubus Nailkaiser, a former villain, Angel Blade storms the demons' stronghold and face off with Dark Mother herself.
